mapper.select: select id, order_sn, username, pay_amount, pay_type, source_type, status, order_type, note, payment_time, comment_time, create_time, modify_time, room_name, floor, serial, pic, room_id, card_id, register_status, check_in_time, check_out_time from hotel.oms_order where id = #{id}

select id, order_sn, username, pay_amount, pay_type, source_type, status, order_type, note, payment_time, comment_time, create_time, modify_time, room_name, floor, serial, pic, room_id, card_id, register_status, check_in_time, check_out_time from hotel.oms_order limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into hotel.oms_order(order_sn, username, pay_amount, pay_type, source_type, status, order_type, note, payment_time, comment_time, create_time, modify_time, room_name, floor, serial, pic, room_id, card_id, register_status, check_in_time, check_out_time) values (#{orderSn}, #{username}, #{payAmount}, #{payType}, #{sourceType}, #{status}, #{orderType}, #{note}, #{paymentTime}, #{commentTime}, #{createTime}, #{modifyTime}, #{roomName}, #{floor}, #{serial}, #{pic}, #{roomId}, #{cardId}, #{registerStatus}, #{checkInTime}, #{checkOutTime})

insert into hotel.oms_order(order_sn, username, pay_amount, pay_type, source_type, status, order_type, note, payment_time, comment_time, create_time, modify_time, room_name, floor, serial, pic, room_id, card_id, register_status, check_in_time, check_out_time) values
(#{entity.orderSn}, #{entity.username}, #{entity.payAmount}, #{entity.payType}, #{entity.sourceType}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.orderType}, #{entity.note}, #{entity.paymentTime}, #{entity.commentTime}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.modifyTime}, #{entity.roomName}, #{entity.floor}, #{entity.serial}, #{entity.pic}, #{entity.roomId}, #{entity.cardId}, #{entity.registerStatus}, #{entity.checkInTime}, #{entity.checkOutTime})

insert into hotel.oms_order(order_sn, username, pay_amount, pay_type, source_type, status, order_type, note, payment_time, comment_time, create_time, modify_time, room_name, floor, serial, pic, room_id, card_id, register_status, check_in_time, check_out_time) values
(#{entity.orderSn}, #{entity.username}, #{entity.payAmount}, #{entity.payType}, #{entity.sourceType}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.orderType}, #{entity.note}, #{entity.paymentTime}, #{entity.commentTime}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.modifyTime}, #{entity.roomName}, #{entity.floor}, #{entity.serial}, #{entity.pic}, #{entity.roomId}, #{entity.cardId}, #{entity.registerStatus}, #{entity.checkInTime}, #{entity.checkOutTime})
on duplicate key update order_sn = values(order_sn) , username = values(username) , pay_amount = values(pay_amount) , pay_type = values(pay_type) , source_type = values(source_type) , status = values(status) , order_type = values(order_type) , note = values(note) , payment_time = values(payment_time) , comment_time = values(comment_time) , create_time = values(create_time) , modify_time = values(modify_time) , room_name = values(room_name) , floor = values(floor) , serial = values(serial) , pic = values(pic) , room_id = values(room_id) , card_id = values(card_id) , register_status = values(register_status) , check_in_time = values(check_in_time) , check_out_time = values(check_out_time)
mapper.update:
update hotel.oms_order
order_sn = #{orderSn},
username = #{username},
pay_amount = #{payAmount},
pay_type = #{payType},
source_type = #{sourceType},
status = #{status},
order_type = #{orderType},
note = #{note},
payment_time = #{paymentTime},
comment_time = #{commentTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
modify_time = #{modifyTime},
room_name = #{roomName},
floor = #{floor},
serial = #{serial},
pic = #{pic},
room_id = #{roomId},
card_id = #{cardId},
register_status = #{registerStatus},
check_in_time = #{checkInTime},
check_out_time = #{checkOutTime},
where id = #{id}
